articles.title: Minerva Academy FC enters history books as first Indian side to lift Gothia Cup - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Minerva Academy was representing India at the tournament, which has in the past seen participation from the likes of Zlatan Ibrahimovic, Andrea Pirlo and Xabi Alonso
